root.name: Hungry Giraffe
root.description: OverviewHungry Giraffe is a game similar to the endless jumper genre, where the player has to guide the eponymous hungry giraffe as he constantly stretches his head higher and higher towards a new batches of food before he collapses from hunger. Differences between platformsThe original PlayStation minis version had higher resolution than minis games were used to have when played on PlayStation 3.The PlayStation Vita and iOS versions use the motion sensors as controls and also add online leaderboards, additional power-ups and upgrades, skins, trophies and an in-game store.
